Boy abducted from R.I. home found safe

A 2-year-old boy kidnapped from a Rhode Island home where police made an early morning discovery of two bodies was found Sunday night "in good health," police said.

Officials say Muni Savyon, 54, shot his 9-year-old son Joshua Savyon to death before taking his own life during supervised visitation at a YWCA office in Manchester.
